title: ActionConfiguration
description:
Represents an action executed by an agent in the system.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)

Command.description:
The command associated with the agent's action.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-command

RunSqlSelect.description:
The SQL SELECT action executed by the agent.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-runsqlselect

oneOf.description: Executes a SQL SELECT query against a database.

DatabaseProvider.description:
Specifies the database provider to be used for executing the SQL query.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-runsqlselect-databaseprovider

ConnectionString.description:
Contains the connection details required to establish communication with the target database.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-runsqlselect-connectionstring

SqlQuery.description:
Represents the SQL SELECT query that will be executed against the database.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-runsqlselect-sqlquery

Explanation.description:
Provides a descriptive explanation of the SQL SELECT action.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-runsqlselect-explanation

SendToPipedrive.description:
The action to send data to Pipedrive.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-sendtopipedrive

Language.description:
Language context for the action

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-sendtopipedrive-language

ChangePrompt.description:
The action responsible for changing the agent's prompt.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-changeprompt

oneOf.description: Sets the prompt to be used by the agent for subsequent operations.

Name.description:
The name of the prompt to be set or activated for the agent.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-changeprompt-name

ChangetLlmConnector.description:
The action responsible for configuring the LLM connector associated with the agent.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-changetllmconnector

oneOf.description: Sets the LLM connector to be used by the agent.

Name.description:
The name of the LLM connector to be used.

Manual: https://docs.hal.guru/models/(action)-changetllmconnector-name
